DataElement.preferredDefinition: The study of the structure of the cells and their arrangement to constitute tissues and, finally, the association among these to form organs.  In pathology, the microscopic process of identifying normal and abnormal morphologic characteristics in tissues, by employing various cytochemical and immunocytochemical stains._A written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.
